subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?
author: April Abercrombie

------=_NextPart_000_004B_01C9D9F0.D5B42060
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I don't have a problem contacting the seller, but again, someone has knows =
Frank better would be more qualified. Actually, it would be best for Frank =
to do it, if he cares to. Maybe it is none of our business, unless Frank as=
ks us to do it for him.


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: April Abe=
rcrombie 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 8:4=
4 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?





=

  Yeah-the seller, but you can't contact the bidders.

    ----- Original =
Message ----- 
    From: threadsintyme@... 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s.com 
    Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 8:41 AM
    Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] =
Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?


    They most certainly do, Krist=
in. There is a place on the ad where you can contact the seller directly an=
d raise the issue with the seller.
    Al
    ---------- Original Message -=
---------
    From: "Kristin Morris" <ckmorris95@...>
    To: <EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
    Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sort=
a Frank's Box?
    Date: Thu, 21 May 2009 09:17:07 -0500




    I don=92t =
think EBAY allows people to contact the bidders anymore.. that=92s why thei=
r names are partially hidden??  I know how you feel tho..



--------------=
--------------------------------------------------------------

    From: E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April =
Abercrombie
    Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 9:09 AM
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box=
?







    Yes...I know.... but it is fun to fantasize. Plus, if I am in =
a position to make a difference I will. The problem is knowing when or wher=
e that position is.


      ----- Original Message ----- 

      From: Kris=
tin Morris 

      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

      Sent: Thursday, May =
21, 2009 7:56 AM

      Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta F=
rank's Box?


      We can=92t police the entire internet.  People should t=
ake responsibility for themselves and do some research and find out how thi=
s works before they purchase.  

      Caveat emptor..  


----------------=
----------------------------------------------------------

      From: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April Ab=
ercrombie
      Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 8:45 AM
      To: EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups.com
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's=
 Box?







      Exactly! That's what I'm sayin'.

      Wouldn't it be a=
 hoot if Frank himself blasted the guy. But that isn't the mature way..... =
;)

        ----- Original Message ----- 

        From: threadsintyme@juno=
.com 

        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

        Sent: Thursday, May 21=
, 2009 5:52 AM

        Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta F=
rank's Box?

        Why don't some of us respond to his ad...and take seri=
ous issue with this business of his lying to the public about Frank? 

    =
    That info is a serious breach of eBay policy. He could be banned from e=
Bay for life. 
        Al
        ---------- Original Message ----------
  =
      From: "Kristin Morris" <ckmorris95@...>
        To: <EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups.com>
        Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sort=
a Frank's Box?
        Date: Thu, 21 May 2009 06:16:27 -0500

        WOW..=
 Frank.  I didn=92t realize you were charging =96 and =93thousands of dolla=
rs=94 to boot!  Must be to pay for that Faraday Cage and the white noise ge=
nerator thing this yahoo believes are in all your creations.  And hurry bec=
ause =93his supplier=94 (cough =96 cough Radio Shack) is discontinuing!  Bu=
t no worries he has =93sold over 2 dozen of these =91Frank=92s Boxes device=
s=94 so he must be legit because he knows =96 and actual customer bought a =
=91real=92 Frank=92s Box and said it was equal!  Awesome=85

        k


--=
----------------------------------------------------------------------

   =
     From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Beha=
lf Of ourobouros2k2
        Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 12:50 AM
        T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
        Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for =
sorta Frank's Box?








        Been following this unprofessional idiot=
's items for awhile now. I love how he says that Frank charges thousands of=
 dollars for an original Frank's box. 

        This dude is the worst type=
 of con, preying on people who know only enough to be familiar with the ter=
m Frank's box. Then again, it always has bothered me when people take shack=
 hacks and charge stupid prices for them on ebay under the Frank's box moni=
ker.

        This guy is based out of Nevada I believe, and his group's et=
hics leave little to be desired. Takes all kinds, I reckon...

        Andy=


        --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Aquarius <laustin@...> wrote:
   =
     >
        > Hmmm... saw this on Ebay tonight... you've got to read all=
 the text to hear
        > how he describes what he's selling. 
        > =

        > Do any of you on this list know who he is? I just thought this w=
as kind of
        > interesting... see:
        > 
        > http://tinyur=
l.com/o5pper
        > 
        > Cheers,
        > 
        > Leslie, cons=
istent lurker and occasional poster <g>
        > 
        > "I'm not happy=
, I'm cheerful. There's a difference. A happy woman has no
        > cares =
at all. A cheerful woman has cares but has learned how to deal with them."
=
        > 
        > -- Beverly Sills (1929-) American Opera Singer
